item.title: Ice storm of December 21-22, 2013 and the Sperry-Piltz Ice Accumulation Index
item.description: On the Sperry-Piltz Ice Accumulation Index: The Sperryâ€“Piltz Ice Accumulation Index, or SPIA Index, is a forward-looking, ice accumulation and ice damage prediction index that uses an algorithm of researched parameters that, when combined with National Weather Service forecast data, predicts the projected footprint, total ice accumulation, and resulting potential damage from approaching ice storms. It is a tool to be used for risk management and/or winter weather preparedness.
